import React, {useState, useEffect, useContext, useRef } from 'react'; import { IonModal, IonGrid, IonRow, IonCol, IonButton, IonSlides, IonSlide, IonContent, IonHeader, IonInput } from '@ionic/react'; export function Pokemon_Details_Modal(props) { useEffect(() => { fetch('https://zasava.com/hotel_merchantAcct_argsjqApp') .then(res => res.text()) .then(res => { let rows = res.toString().split('~~~'); setViewInventoryBookedRoomDetailData((prevViewInventoryOccupiedRoomDetailData) => { return prevViewInventoryOccupiedRoomDetailData.concat({ roomID: cols[0], roomType: cols[1], roomDescription: cols[2], roomPartNum: cols[3], roomPhoneNumber: cols[4], address: cols[5], city: cols[6], country: cols[7], roomSalePrice: cols[8], roomPic1: cols[9], roomPic2: cols[10], roomPic3: cols[11], roomPic4: cols[12], attachment: cols[13], roomGuestFirstName: cols[14], roomGuestLastName: cols[15], roomGuestPhoneNumber: cols[16], roomGuestEmail: cols[17], roomGuestPaymentType: cols[18], roomGuestPrice: cols[19], roomGuestCheckInDateBooked: cols[20], roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked: cols[21], roomGuestCheckInDateActual: cols[22], merchantInvoiceID: cols[23], customerInvoiceID: cols[24], invoiceSentStatus: cols[25], transactionID: cols[26], transactionTotalAmount: parseFloat(cols[27]*1).toFixed(2), transactionStatus: cols[28], roomGuestInvoiceAttachment: cols[29], }) }); }) }, []); return ( {props.openModal == true ? ( Room ID Price Per Night {props.data.roomID} {parseFloat(props.data.roomSalePrice).toFixed(2)} {viewInventoryBookedRoomDetailData.map((detailData) => { return ( Category Value Action Invoice ID {detailData.merchantInvoiceID} {detailData.merchantInvoiceID == 'booking_non_member' && - } {detailData.merchantInvoiceID != 'booking_non_member' && viewInvoiceModalHandler([true, detailData.roomID, detailData.roomSalePrice, detailData.roomGuestInvoiceAttachment])}> View } Change Room { 'ID: '+detailData.roomID+ 'Part Number: '+detailData.roomPartNum} handleUpdate_room([true, detailData.roomGuestCheckInDateBooked, detailData.roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked])} class='gridResultColumnButton'> Update Room Images {detailData.roomType} setRoomPicsModal(false)} data={{ roomPic1: detailData.roomPic1, roomPic2: detailData.roomPic2, roomPic3: detailData.roomPic3, roomPic4: detailData.roomPic4, roomID: detailData.roomID, roomSalePrice: detailData.roomSalePrice }}> setRoomPicsModal(true)}> View Check-In Date {detailData.roomGuestCheckInDateBooked} handleUpdate_checkInDate([true, detailData.roomGuestCheckInDateBooked, detailData.roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked])} class='gridResultColumnButton'> Update Check-Out Date {detailData.roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked} handleUpdate_checkOutDate([true, detailData.roomGuestCheckInDateBooked, detailData.roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked])} class='gridResultColumnButton'> Update # of Nights {numOfNights} - Guest Contact { 'Name: '+detailData.roomGuestFirstName+' '+detailData.roomGuestLastName+ 'Phone Number: '+detailData.roomGuestPhoneNumber+ 'Email: '+detailData.roomGuestEmail} - Guest Room Price {detailData.roomGuestPrice} - Guest Payment Type {detailData.roomGuestPaymentType} - Deposit Paid {detailData.transactionTotalAmount} - Pay {parseFloat(guestPayAmount - detailData.transactionTotalAmount).toFixed(2)} - Deposit

{enterDepositRef.current.value+' GH'}

 setDepositHandler()}>Set resetDepositHandler()}>Reset Pending Payment/View Sent {authenticatedMerchent_context.accessRights[0] == 'admin' && prepareInvoice_thenConfirmPay_nonMember([detailData.transactionID, detailData.merchantInvoiceID, detailData.customerInvoiceID, detailData.roomGuestPhoneNumber, '74605_B_bookDeposit', enterDepositRef.current.value, detailData.roomID, detailData.roomGuestFirstName, detailData.roomGuestLastName, detailData.roomGuestPhoneNumber, detailData.roomGuestEmail, detailData.roomGuestPaymentType, detailData.roomGuestPrice])}> Pay }

Payment Confirmed

checkInModalHandler([true, detailData.roomID, detailData.roomSalePrice, detailData.roomGuestFirstName, detailData.roomGuestLastName, detailData.roomGuestPhoneNumber, detailData.roomGuestEmail, detailData.roomGuestCheckInDateBooked, detailData.roomGuestCheckOutDateBooked])} class='gridResultColumnButton'> Check-In Guest {(detailData.merchantInvoiceID == 'booking_non_member' || detailData.transactionTotalAmount == 0.00) && setShowPasswordModal(true)}> Delete Booking } REFUND

{enterRefundRef.current.value+' GH'}

 setRefundHandler()}>Set resetRefundHandler()}>Reset {detailData.merchantInvoiceID != 'booking_non_member' && refund([detailData.transactionID, detailData.merchantInvoiceID, detailData.customerInvoiceID, detailData.roomGuestPhoneNumber, '74605_B_bookDeposit_refund', enterRefundRef.current.value, detailData.roomID])}> Refund } ) } )} Close ) : null} ) }
